options.title: Inputs
options.description: Every sound event has inputs. Some examples are a microphone, an instrument such as a keyboard or electric guitar, or a phone. For most events, the number of inputs is the number of microphones. We do not count inputs from our own laptop for playing music.

choices.title: Small
choices.detailPrompt: Please describe your microphone and laptop/phone input requirements.
choices.description: Music and up to 2 inputs. Suitable for speaking events, small performances, or background music.

choices.title: Medium
choices.detailPrompt: Please describe your microphone and other input requirements, including any instruments/vocalists that need to be mic'ed, any DIs required, laptop input, etc.
choices.description: Music and up to 8 inputs. Suitable for panel discussions or small performances.

choices.title: Large
choices.detailPrompt: Please describe your microphone and other input requirements, including any instruments/vocalists that need to be mic'ed, any DIs required, etc. If your event is a stage show with multiple acts, you will be asked for a set list via email and you only need to provide a general description here.
choices.description: Unlimited inputs. Suitable for large stage shows, concerts, bands, or other large events.

options.title: Speakers
options.description: If your event needs more than two main speakers, such as for surround sound or a large concert, contact us.

choices.title: House System
choices.description: We will use the speakers that are permanently installed in the venue.

choices.title: Small
choices.description: Two small speakers. Suitable for speaking events, casual background music, or small event spaces.

choices.title: Large
choices.description: Two larger speakers. Suitable for stage shows, dances, or larger event spaces.

choices.title: Subwoofers
choices.description: Subwoofers add bass to your event's sound. Recommended for bands, stage shows, or dances. Suitable for most events involving music.

choices.title: Stage Monitors
choices.description: Monitors for on-stage performers. Recommended for stage shows and bands.

choices.title: Area Fills
choices.description: Additional speakers to fill a large or oddly-shaped venue.

addons.title: Wireless Microphone
addons.description: Wired microphones are included but there is a fee per wireless microphone.

choices.title: Basic
choices.description: Basic static lighting for your stage or performance area. No changing colors, moving lights, different scenes, etc. Maximum of 8 fixtures.

options.title: Area lighting
options.description: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Nunc eu sem elit. Mauris varius quis nulla ut condimentum.

choices.title: Basic
choices.description: Basic area lighting that can be dimmed. No changing colors, moving lights, different scenes, etc.

options.title: Haze
options.description: We own one fog machine and can rent more to suit your needs. Use of haze requires a fire watch which you must arrange and pay for.

options.title: Rigging
options.description: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Nunc eu sem elit. Mauris varius quis nulla ut condimentum.

addons.title: Special spot / photo booth light
addons.description: For all your inconveniently-located lighting needs

choices.title: Power Distribution
choices.description: Power your pizza warmers or something.
